title: What is an arithmetic sequence?
text: An arithmetic sequence is a sequence where each term increases by $$\frac{adding}{subtracting}$$ some constant k.
speech: An arithmetic sequence is a sequence where each term increases by  adding over subtracting  some constant k.
pacedSpeech: An arithmetic sequence is a sequence where each term increases by   adding over subtracting

title: Common difference
text: The sequence is arithmetic; the common difference is $$7$$.
speech: The sequence is arithmetic: the common difference is  7 .
pacedSpeech: The sequence is arithmetic the common difference is   7
